description: Represents patch configuration parameters used in foraging experiments.
title: TriggerParameters

probability.description: Specifies probability of a loom to be triggered

angleThreshold.description: Specifies Angle between Subject and point to be triggered

refractoryPeriodSeconds.description: Specifies minimum time without Triggers after one

timeInAreaThreshold.description: Specifies threshold time for subject to be within specified region to be triggered
